title: For redevelopment of building or buildings in the housing schemes of CIDCO, containing houses or ten
clause_text: For redevelopment of building or buildings in the housing schemes of CIDCO, containing houses or tenements for (i) EWS / LIG and / or (ii) MIG and / or (iii) HIG, the total permissible FSI shall as specified in Table belowor Rehab + Incentive FSI as per clause 2(A) & (B), whichever is more and shall be based on gross plot area :-

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
